akas: Angekettet - Ein Bund fürs Überleben Germany (DVD title)
akas from release info: Angekettet - Ein Bund fürs Überleben Germany (DVD title)

1.title: Pacific Islands, Panama
1.plot: Polar opposites, Keith, a hard-headed Navy vet, and free-spirited yoga expert, Willow, must endure Panama's boa-ridden swamps and an army of biting insects.

2.title: El Camino Real Jungle, Panama
2.plot: Jay, a bull rider and Matt, a 'by the book' intellectual face off against snakes, bat infested caves, and raging rivers in the Panamanian Jungle.

3.title: Chugach Mountains, Alaska
3.plot: Blake, a Biology professor, and Caesar, a Shaman, must traverse the Chugash Mountains to reach civilisation. All while tied together by a six-foot tether.

4.title: Kodiak Archipelago, Alaska
4.plot: Henry, an experienced outdoors man and biologist, and Laura, an Air Force veteran with a tough-girl exterior, are locked together by a four-foot tether.

5.title: Alligator Bayou, Louisiana
5.plot: Rob, is an environmentalist and Kevin, is a real estate mogul who is living the dream. They must make it 37 miles tethered together through a bayou.

6.title: Great Smoky Mountains
6.plot: Nick, a gold miner from Alaska and Jameson, a therapist from Haiti must navigate through rugged terrain all while locked together by a four-foot tether.

imdb.plot outline: In dire situations, man's greatest survival tool is the strength, comradeship and skill of the people he is with - so long as he can stand them. TETHERED sees two strangers from opposite backgrounds and philosophies embark on a journey across treacherous terrain on a mission to find rescue and freedom. Dropped at the meeting point with just the six-foot cable that binds them together, a basic map and a limited survival kit, the polar opposite pairing has 10 to 12 days to overcome their differences and collaborate in order to escape the wild. The tethered duos may have to learn the hard way that the best way to survive is to stick together.
imdb.title: Tethered
plot: Tensions run high when two polar opposites are forced to survive treacherous conditions in remote areas of the world. They have just 10 days to make it to their extraction point - all while tethered together just six feet apart.

In dire situations, man's greatest survival tool is the strength, comradeship and skill of the people he is with - so long as he can stand them. TETHERED sees two strangers from opposite backgrounds and philosophies embark on a journey across treacherous terrain on a mission to find rescue and freedom. Dropped at the meeting point with just the six-foot cable that binds them together, a basic map and a limited survival kit, the polar opposite pairing has 10 to 12 days to overcome their differences and collaborate in order to escape the wild. The tethered duos may have to learn the hard way that the best way to survive is to stick together.
